item.title: STLA
item.description: score:6 Chances: Stellantis is offering a 14.5% wage hike to UAW, which may help mitigate the risk of a potential strike. The company plans to expand its battery capacity, positioning itself for growth in the EV market. Stellantis is exploring the use of e-fuels, demonstrating its commitment to sustainable and alternative technologies.

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:33 Chances: Swiss Bank doubled down on EV stock Rivian and achieved significant gains, indicating investor interest. Battery material price easing expected in the next year could benefit Rivian’s EV production. Rivian’s participation in the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference suggests market engagement.

item.title: QS
item.description: score:-160 Chances: QuantumScape’s focus on developing next-generation solid-state lithium-metal batteries showcases its commitment to innovative technology, which could position it well in the evolving EV industry. Despite recent fluctuations in QS stock, the company’s ability to raise significant capital through underwritten public offerings demonstrates investor interest and support for its growth initiatives.
